physical_quantity: Measures geometric compatibility and charge-size coupling affecting perovskite stability
information_required: ionic radii of A, B, B′, and X
oxidation states of A, B, B′, and X
why_it_matters: This CV integrates size mismatch and charge balance effects by combining ionic radii and oxidation states in a nonlinear way, capturing distortions and electrostatic constraints that influence the formation and stability of perovskite structures across oxides and halides.
definition: MGSF = ( (rA + rX) / (sqrt((rB + rB′)/2 + rX)) ) * exp(-|nA/rA - (nB + nB′)/(2*rB)|)  for double perovskites; for single perovskites (ABX3), replace (rB + rB′)/2 and (nB + nB′)/2 with rB and nB respectively.
